Congratulations. You managed to retrieve the Blink.
You couldn\'t retrieve the Blink. The world is in great danger. Fortunately we can go back in time. Be careful. Time travel to same time might have unwanted effects on timeline.
Normal Mode

Use Blink

Year 2099. You are working for a private research company called Void. You are in a 7 people team and Void is considered one of the most successful research company. 2 weeks ago a successful teleportation was achieved by one of your employees, a military company called Militech. Due to the sensitive nature of matter this information was withheld from public prevent panic and chaos. Immediate mass production of teleportation devices, called \"Blink\", was requested from government. One Blink can only be used to go back to a specific place and come back to the place that it was used. Unfortunately yesterday four of the Blink\'s were stolen from company vault. There are no suspects since the project is classified as top secret and only a handful of people knows the company vault passcode. It is possible that duplication of can be achieved by third parties and used for crimes or political interests. You\'re one of the workers who are assigned to seek, investigate, and collect these devices. After each mission you are expected to complete an psychological evaluation form created by revolutionary Militech AI, Spectre to make sure you are in good form to work.

string-array.name: eval_1_q1_array
string-array.item: Hello I am Spectre. I am responsible of your mental health. I will ask you 3 questions. Please answer each of these to the best of your ability.\n What do you think of your first mission?

string-array.name: eval_1_q2_array
string-array.item: Your feedback is important to Militech.\n What do you of Militech?

string-array.name: eval_1_q3_array
string-array.item: It is important that you answer the questions truthfully.\n How many non-Militech people did you talked about the accident?

resources.string: First Blink is collected successfully. After the Blink is secured the criminal caught was interrogated but no information on theft or accomplices could be obtained. The possibility of the situation leaking into the media is forcing Militech\'s hands. Time is running out. A few days later you are sent to track another lead.

string-array.name: eval_2_q1_array
string-array.item: Hello again! Great job capturing the second Blink. I will ask you 3 questions. Please answer each of these to the best of your ability.\n What do you think of your second mission?

resources.string-array:
Your feedback is important to Militech.\n
Do you think Void will be able to retrieve all of the devices?
Yes
Not Sure
No

string-array.name: eval_2_q3_array
string-array.item: It is important that you answer the questions truthfully.\n How many non-Militech people did you talked about the accident?

resources.string: One of your team members ,Janice, that you worked with for three years had a horrible accident. Due to a malfunction on their Blink only the top half of their body got back from teleportation. After the examination no problem was found on the device. Militech decided autopsy and further examination is required to avoid another accident. You and your team was given a 2 days off on condition that no new information is found. Information on third Blink was found a week later after second one.

string-array.name: eval_3_q1_array
string-array.item: Hello! Sorry to hear about your friend. I hope you\'re ready to work again. I created 3 questions for you. Please answer each of these to the best of your ability.\n How are you feeling?

string-array.name: eval_3_q2_array
string-array.item: Your feedback is important to Militech.\n Do you think your team will be able to retrieve all of the devices?

string-array.name: eval_3_q3_array
string-array.item: It is important that you answer the questions truthfully.\n Do you think the decrease of the people in team will slow down the process?
We will find a new team member
I will work more to close the gap

resources.string: Third Blink was found in an abandoned warehouse and no suspects could be caught. There was no information whether the Blink\'s have been duplicated. Next day, the two suspects that got captured with Blinks were found dead in their cells. It is suspected that possessor of the last Blink is the culprit of the murder. A few days after you are sent to find the ,hopefully, the last Blink.

string-array.name: eval_4_q1_array
string-array.item: Hello again! I prepared 3 questions for you to answer. Please answer carefully.\n Do you remember the name of your missing team member?

string-array.name: eval_4_q2_array
string-array.item: Your feedback is important to Militech.\n Are you afraid of death?

string-array.name: eval_4_q3_array
string-array.item: It is important that you answer the questions truthfully.\n Do you think all Blink\'s are captured?

resources.string: The last Blink was found with on a dead person in a junkyard. There was no indication that death was caused by the device. The body had showed signs of struggle and the cause of death seems to be suffocation. After the third blink is secured there were no incidents for ten days. The case was almost closed and Militech decided it is safe for military to use Blinks. The cause of the accident of your team member is determined to be a user-induced error since no problem could be found on device. Before the day of distribution to the military, Void got an anonymous tip about another Blink has been found. Your team is dispatched immediately.

string-array.name: eval_5_q1_array
string-array.item: An unexpected error occurred. Traceback (most recent call last) \U+003E ipython-input-3-a9d99df9a3df> in \U+003E module>()

string-array.name: eval_5_q2_array
string-array.item: Is this what death feels like?

resources.string: Blink was owned by a armed gang. During the shootout, 7 Militech mercenary got shot and killed also your Blink got destroyed. You took the Blink from one of the dead bodies and came back to present. All of team made it alive but 6 Blinks were lost and captured by armed gang. Your team couldn\'t manage to retrieve any information about duplication of Blinks. Spectre was found to have some corruption and it was rebooted from a restore point. The safety of Void\'s psychological evaluations are ensured by Militech.

string-array.name: eval_6_q1_array
string-array.item: Hello I am Spectre. I am responsible of your mental health. I will ask you 3 questions. Please answer each of these to the best of your ability.\n Do you trust Militech?

string-array.name: eval_6_q2_array
string-array.item: Your feedback is important to Militech.\n Do you trust Void?

string-array.name: eval_6_q3_array
string-array.item: It is important that you answer the questions truthfully.\n Do you trust your team members?

resources.string: Militech started an investigation of their employees to make sure the fifth Blink wasn\'t After the interrogation

string-array.name: eval_7_q1_array
string-array.item: Hello again, I\'m Spectre! I prepared 3 questions for you to answer. Please answer carefully.\n

string-array.name: eval_7_q2_array
string-array.item: Your feedback is important to Militech.\n

string-array.name: eval_7_q3_array
string-array.item: It is important that you answer the questions truthfully.\n

string-array.name: eval_10_q3_array
string-array.item: It is important that you answer the questions truthfully.\n

resources.string: It is a country located mostly in the southern half of South America. Capital Buenos Aires has a population of about 3 million people.

It is on the South American continent bordered by Bolivia, Brazil, Chile, Paraguay and Uruguay. The official language is Spanish, however, other languages such as Italian, English, German,French and various indigenous languages are also spoken.

It is the largest country in Oceania and the world\'s sixth-largest country by total area. Country\'s capital is Canberra, though its largest city is Sydney. The country\'s other major metropolitan areas are Melbourne, Brisbane, Perth, and Adelaide.

It is a country in the Southern hemisphere and belongs to Oceania. It is an island continent surrounded by the Indian Ocean and the Pacific Ocean. The country\'s interior, which covers two thirds of the country, consist of desert landscape which is referred to as \'outback\'.
It\'s two official languages are Russian and Belarusian. Its capital and most populous city is Minsk.

It is bordered by Russia to the northeast, Ukraine to the south, Poland to the west, and Lithuania and Latvia to the northwest. Three major rivers run through the country: the Neman, the Pripyat, and the Dnieper.

It is the largest country in both South America and Latin America.Capital city is Brasilia, with 4.2 million inhabitants is the country\'s fourth largest city.The largest city in Brazil is Sao Paulo with about 12 million inhabitants.

It borders all other countries in South America except Ecuador and Chile and covers 47.3% of the continent\'s land area.The country borders the Atlantic Ocean. It is the largest country to have Portuguese as an official language.

It is a country in Southeastern Europe. It is bordered by Romania to the north, Serbia and North Macedonia to the west, Greece and Turkey to the south, and the Black Sea to the east. The capital and largest city is Sofia; other major cities are Plovdiv, Varna and Burgas.

The country occupies a portion of the eastern Balkan peninsula, bordering five countries—Greece and Turkey to the south, North Macedonia and Serbia to the west, and Romania to the north. The Balkan mountains run laterally through the middle of the country from west to east.
Its southern border with the United States is the world\'s longest bi-national land border. It\'s capital is Ottawa, and its three largest metropolitan areas are Toronto, Montreal, and Vancouver.
It has the largest waterfalls by water volume. These are the Niagara Falls. It is the world leader of Hydro Electricity which uses the power of the water to produce electricity.
More than 1.43 billion people live in this country. The capital is Beijing with 21.7 million inhabitants. It is not only the capital city but also the second biggest city after Shanghai.
National symbols are dragon and giant panda. It is the fourth largest country in the world after Russia, Canada and the USA. Although the country is so large, there is only one timezone.

It is a country on the eastern coast of the Baltic Sea in Northern Europe. It lies on the eastern shores of the Baltic Sea immediately across the Gulf of Finland. Capital city is Tallinn. The official language of the country, is the second-most-spoken Finnic language.

It is bordered to the north by the Gulf of Finland with Finland on the other side, to the west by the Baltic Sea with Sweden on the other side, to the south by Latvia, and to the east by Lake Peipus and Russia. A small, recent cluster of meteorite craters, the largest of which is called Kaali is found on Saaremaa.

France is a unitary semi-presidential republic with its capital in Paris, the country\'s largest city and main cultural and commercial centre. It is bordered by Belgium, Luxembourg and Germany to the northeast, Switzerland, Monaco, and Italy to the east, and Andorra and Spain to the south.

Major urban areas include Lyon, Marseille, Toulouse, Bordeaux, Lille and Nice. The country, including its overseas territories, has the most number of time zones of any country, with a total of 12. France 2

This country is located in south-central Europe,and it is also considered a part of western Europe. It\'s capital is Roma (Rome), which is often called \'Eternal City\', with 2.9 mio inhabitants.Italy lies in Southern Europe and is one of the six founding countries of the European Union.

With around 60 million inhabitants, it is the third-most populous member state of the European Union.The colours are said to represent these virtues: hope (green), faith (white), and charity (red). It borders six countries: France, Austria, Switzerland, Slovenia, Vatican City and San Marino.
It is an island country in East Asia. Located in the northwestern Pacific Ocean. Tokyo is the country\'s capital and largest city; other major cities include Osaka and Nagoya.

It is the 11th most populous country in the world, as well as one of the most densely populated and urbanized. Its five largest islands, from north to south, are Hokkaido, Honshu, Shikoku, Kyushu, and Okinawa.

It is the world\'s 10th-most populous country and most populous Spanish-speaking nation. The border between this country and the USA is the second longest border in the world and is about 3,155km/2,000 miles long.

Capital city is Doha. The official language is Arabic. It is a desert country bordering Saudi Arabia on the Arab peninsula. It has a dry desert climate and temperatures can easily reach more than 40°C/ 104°F in summer.

The national airline is one of the largest airlines in the world. The country lies on a peninsula in the Persian Gulf. It Qatar the third largest natural gas reserves in the world, after Russia and Iran.

It is the largest country in the world by area, spanning more than one-eighth of the Earth\'s inhabited land area, stretching eleven time zones, and bordering 16 sovereign nations. Capital and largest city is Moscow.

It is a transcontinental country located in Eastern Europe and Northern Asia. The territory of extends from the Baltic Sea in the west to the Pacific Ocean in the east, and from the Arctic Ocean in the north to the Black Sea and the Caucasus in the south. Major urban areas include Saint Petersburg, Novosibirsk, Yekaterinburg, Nizhny Novgorod, Kazan and Chelyabinsk.

Istanbul, which straddles Europe and Asia, is the largest city in the country, while Ankara is the capital. The country is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean to the south.

It is a transcontinental country located mainly on the Anatolian peninsula in Western Asia, with a smaller portion on the Balkan peninsula in Southeastern Europe. Turkey is bordered on its northwest by Greece and Bulgaria; north by the Black Sea; northeast by Georgia; east by Armenia, the Azerbaijani exclave of Nakhchivan and Iran; southeast by Iraq; south by Syria and the Mediterranean Sea; and west by the Aegean Sea.
The country\'s capital is London, a global city and financial centre with an urban area population of 10.3 million. Other major cities include Birmingham, Glasgow, Leeds, Liverpool, and Manchester.

It is a sovereign country located off the north­western coast of the European mainland. It is surrounded by the Atlantic Ocean, with the North Sea to the east, the English Channel to the south and the Celtic Sea to the southwest, giving it the 12th-longest coastline in the world. It is located mainly on two large islands in the Atlantic Ocean.
It is a country in the southeastern region of South America. Its capital and largest city is Montevideo.

It borders Argentina to its west and southwest and Brazil to its north and east, with the Río de la Plata (River of Silver) to the south and the Atlantic Ocean to the southeast. It is the only country in South America situated entirely south of the Tropic of Capricorn.
The capital is Washington, D.C., and the most populous city is New York City. It is the third largest country in the world.

The country shares land borders with Canada and with Mexico. The border shared with Canada is the longest international border in the world. It is the third most populous country in the world after China and India.
